import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create multiple rooms"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v2.0/locations/rooms/new/batch"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates multiple rooms in a single batch operation. Each room entry is created independently, making this useful for initial setup or bulk imports.

**Prerequisites**
1. **LocationId** - Use [GET /api/v2.0/locations](/docs/api/locations/get-my-locations-v-2) or [POST /api/v2.0/locations/view](/docs/api/locations/get-my-locations-view-filtered-v-2) and extract `Items[].LocationId`.
2. **LocationRoomTypeId/LocationRoomStatusTypeId** - Use existing room data or [GET /api/v2.0/locations/rooms/status-types](/docs/api/locations/get-all-location-room-status-types) for status types.

**Workflow Example**
1. Build an array of `UpdateLocationRoomRequest` objects for each room.
2. Submit: [POST /api/v2.0/locations/rooms/new/batch](/docs/api/locations/create-location-rooms-batch).
3. Review the response for created room IDs.

**Minimal Required Fields**: For each room, `LocationId`, `Name`, `LocationRoomTypeId`, `LocationRoomStatusTypeId`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Bearer token for authentication"},{"name":"SiteId","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Site context for the request"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}

to"},"LocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Parent location (building/school) containing this room"},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Room name or number (e.g., 'Room 101', 'Main Office')"},"Number":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Room number identifier"},"LocationRoomTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Reference to the room type in square feet"},"SeatingCapacity":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Number of seats available in the room"},"MaximumOccupancy":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Maximum >
  
</RequestSchema>
